description: Manchester City have announced the signing of Monaco playmaker Bernardo Silva.
title: Bernardo Silva completes Man City transfer from Monaco for £43m

author: BBC Sport
description: Manchester City complete a £43m deal to sign Portugal midfielder Bernardo Silva from French champions Monaco.
title: Bernardo Silva: Manchester City complete £43m deal for Monaco midfielder

author: talkSPORT
description: Manchester City have announced the signing of Monaco playmaker Bernardo Silva. It is understood City will pay £43million for the 22-year-old, who will officially move on July 1. It means City have won the race for the Portugal international ahead of neighbours Manchester United, who were also interested in him. The player flew into Manchester Airport on Thursday night and negotiations were swiftly concluded.
title: CONFIRMED: Manchester City clinch £43million Bernardo Silva signing from Monaco

author: FourFourTwo
description: Monaco star Bernardo Silva appears unlikely to join Manchester United in the off-season.
title: Mourinho plays down talk of Silva move

author: FourFourTwo
description: Bernardo Silva has joined Pep Guardiola's Manchester City following his magnificent season with Ligue 1 champions Monaco.
title: Manchester City swoop for Monaco star Silva
